attic-abstract.title: Flower of the Attic
attic-abstract.about: This piece was created by the original owner of 3 Blueberry Court, Kristen Holt Donovan. It was left behind in the attic, perhaps intentionally, possibly forgotten.

bank-sheet.title: Break in case of Emergency
bank-sheet.about: This is an uncut sheet of 16 $2 bills. They are pof series 1976. This was given to Matthew by his Uncle James, who was a bank VP at the time.

carbink.title: Carbink
carbink.about: This is a pencil drawing of the Pokemon Carbink. While watching 'Pok√©mon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction', we learned that there a Carbink named Merrick. This fact then inspired the drawing and became one of our favorites.

dash-the-dog.title: Dash
dash-the-dog.about: This is a drawing of our dog Dash that Merrick drew at home with Nancy.

matt.title: Caricature of Matthew
matt.about: This piece was created by the original owner of 3 Blueberry Court, Kristen Holt Donovan. It was left behind in the attic, perhaps intentionally, possibly forgotten.
